plot: Beatrice, a reclusive nurse, has just laid her father to rest after years of private hospice care. On her first day back at work, a stalker named Bob makes all her paranoid nightmares - and secret fantasies - come true.
title: Beatrice and Bob
plot_es: Beatrice, a reclusive nurse, has just laid her father to rest after years of private hospice care. On her first day back at work, a stalker named Bob makes all her paranoid nightmares - and secret fantasies - come true.
plot_en: Beatrice, a reclusive nurse, has just laid her father to rest after years of private hospice care. On her first day back at work, a stalker named Bob makes all her paranoid nightmares - and secret fantasies - come true.
